content: © - mary-louise quick 2005 blog odd ball knitting http //mlqknit typepad com/odd_ball_knitting/ web-site mlqknits http //www mlqknits com/ lacy curly whirly scarf crochet crocheted in rowan kidsilk haze and kidsilk spray for edging quantities required 2 3 balls ksh and 1 ball of kss note that all abbreviations are for uk crochet terms opening 180 chains in double thickness on 4 5mm hook followed with foundation row in double_crochet also double thickness change to single yarn and 5 00mm hook for main pattern work increases in every stitch for first row 2 treble_crochet in each double_crochet then 2 treble_crochet in each alternate treble_crochet on 2nd row in every 3rd treble_crochet on 3rd row and so on if you get bored as i did try varying it with the odd row of filet crochet ie 1 treble_crochet in treble_crochet miss 1 treble_crochet 1 chain and treble_crochet in next treble_crochet and work increases in that row as needed the edging is double thickness kss and is 1 double_crochet in every chain space or treble to end
